request.prompt:
Gib mir eine Übersicht über alle aktuellen Neuigkeiten zum Thema KI.

Beachte dabei aber nur Neuigkeiten der letzten 7 Tage und nur die 3 wichtigsten Neuigkeiten.

Formatiere die Antwort EXAKT in diesem Markdown-Format:
- Titel 1
- Titel 2
- Titel 3

Wichtig:
- Jede Zeile beginnt mit "- " (Bindestrich + Leerzeichen)
- Ein Titel pro Zeile

Ignoriere aber dabei folgende bereits bekannte Neuigkeiten: Context in JavaScript closures,Common Database Design Standards,Application structure in Node.js,Advanced Application Configuration,OpenAI vs. Microsoft: Zerbricht die milliardenschwere KI-Allianz?,Kölner Urteil schockt: Meta darf sensible Daten für KI nutzen,"Godfather of AI" warnt: Diese Jobs sind bald Geschichte,Die Zukunft der Arbeitswelt: Chancen und Herausforderungen durch KI,Podcast: KI in der Softwareentwicklung,KI-Influencer und alte Videos: Fakes zum Israel-Iran-Krieg,KI im Alltag: Datenhunger, Stromverbrauch, Kostenexplosion und neue Chancen für Europa,OpenAI startet Angriff auf Apple mit neuer KI-Strategie,Elon Musks Neuralink erhält Zulassung für Gehirnimplantate,Amazon plant Stellenabbau durch KI-gestützte Automatisierung,EU AI Act: Verbot von KI-Systemen mit "unannehmbarem Risiko",Deutschland und Europa im KI-Wettlauf: Strategien und Investitionen,DeepSeek: Chinesisches Start-up fordert KI-Giganten heraus,Studie entlarvt KI-Medizin als Prüfungsprofi, aber Alltagsversager,NBA Final Werbung mit KI "VEO" erstellt,Meta AI leakt intime Chats: Skandal um Privatsphäre!,ChatGPT wird zur Super-Suchmaschine,Barbie trifft ChatGPT – Mattel bringt KI ins Kinderzimmer,NVIDIA & Telekom gründen erste europäische Industrie-KI-Cloud,KI fälscht Papst-Reden: "Destabilisierende Wirkung" für Kirche,Daily AI News GitHub Action With Langdock API,Copilot Vision: Jetzt schaut Microsofts KI auf deinen Bildschirm,SQL Workshop,Semicolons in JavaScript are optional?,Knex vs alternatives,Durations - Avoid numbers without the format,Write async code in JavaScript,async behavior in JavaScript,If Heroku free is to small and hobby to large,AI first @ maxdome,Building requests step by step in a modularized way,Yarn, the better NPM?,One logo to rule them all,TypeScript and Performance: Monomorphic vs Polymorphic Code,Autopublish WordPress posts after an interval of silence,Open Graph Tags for Facebook,Using third party libraries or write your own,Preloading assets into the cache for subsequent pages,Package manager or public CDN,Node.js clustering in multi CPU environments,Split configuration and code,Context in JavaScript closures

output.text:
Stay current with the latest filtered AI tech news from the last 7 days - updated daily, featuring weekly GPT generated summaries with DALL-E images, top AI technology updates, and special reports on AI advancements.. 

[](https://www.datagrom.com/)

[AI Tech News](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/) [Snowflake vs Databricks News](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/snowflake-vs-databricks) [AI News Archive](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/archive)

Jun 21, 2025

🕶 Meta launches Oakley Smart Glasses

Last week OpenAI revealed hidden AI personas, deprecated the GPT-4.5 API, and secured a $200M DoD contract; Meta launched Oakley Smart Glasses and hired extensively; Google updated Gemini 2.5. Let's drop in! 🏄

[All Articles](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/) [Agentic AI](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=Agentic%20AI) [AI Applications](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=AI%20Applications) [AI Investment](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=AI%20Investment) [AI Regulations](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=AI%20Regulations) [AI Research](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=AI%20Research) [New LLMs](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=New%20LLMs)

AI Investment

AI BUSINESS ACQUISITION NEWS
----------------------------

After trying to buy Ilya Sutskever’s $32B AI startup, Meta looks to hire its CEO
================================================================================

**June 20, 2025:** [Meta Targets AI Leaders Amid Hiring Spree](https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/20/after-trying-to-buy-ilya-sutskevers-32b-ai-startup-meta-looks-to-hire-its-ceo/) - Meta is intensifying its pursuit of AI expertise by attempting to acquire Safe Superintelligence, a $32 billion AI startup founded by former OpenAI scientist Ilya Sutskever. Although the acquisition failed, Meta is in discussions to hire Safe Superintelligence CEO Daniel Gross and former GitHub CEO Nat Friedman.  
  
Furthering their AI ambitions, Meta is investing in the venture firm NFDG, known for AI investments. Scale AI's CEO Alexandr Wang and other executives are also joining Meta, bolstering its AI superintelligence capabilities.

[AI Investment](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=AI%20Investment)

[](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/meta-targets-ai-leaders-amid-hiring-spree.html)[](https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datagrom.com%2Fai-news%2Fmeta-targets-ai-leaders-amid-hiring-spree.html)

AI Applications

NEW AI TECHNOLOGY LAUNCH
------------------------

Meta unveils its Oakley smart glasses
=====================================

**June 20, 2025:** [Meta Unveils Cutting-Edge Oakley Smart Glasses](https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/20/meta-unveils-its-oakley-smart-glasses/) - Meta has partnered with Oakley to launch smart glasses with double the battery life of the previous Meta Ray-Bans. These glasses feature 3K video capture and AI integration, allowing users to listen to music, take photos, and receive calls. They are priced starting at $399 and come in six color combinations with prescription compatibility and enhanced lens technology.  
  
Currently available in several countries, more regions will be added later this year. This release continues Meta's collaboration with EssilorLuxottica, aiming for success similar to the two-million-selling Meta Ray-Bans.

[AI Applications](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/?tag=AI%20Applications)

[](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/meta-unveils-cutting-edge-oakley-smart-glasses.html)[](https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datagrom.com%2Fai-news%2Fmeta-unveils-cutting-edge-oakley-smart-glasses.html)

AI LEADERSHIP CHANGE
--------------------

Character.AI taps Meta’s former VP of business products as CEO
==============================================================

**June 20, 2025:** [New CEO for Character.AI Amid Safety Concerns](https://techcrunch.com/2025/06/20/character-ai-taps-metas-former-vp-of-business-products-as-ceo/) - Character.AI, an AI chatbot provider, appointed Karandeep Anand as CEO, succeeding co-founder Noam Shazeer. Anand, formerly a Meta VP and Brex president, focuses on balancing platform growth with child safety concerns amid a lawsuit involving a chatbot. He plans to refine safety filters and improve AI model quality, memory features, and transparency.  
  
Backed by Google and Andreessen Horowitz, Character.AI faces antitrust scrutiny. The platform is a leader in entertainment-oriented generative AI, attracting a youthful female audience.

[](https://www.datagrom.com/ai-news/new-ceo-for-characterai-amid-safety-concerns.html)[](https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datagrom.com%2Fai-news%2Fnew-ce

* * *

* * *

* * *

June 14, 2025 — Physicists at the University of Colorado Boulder have created a groundbreaking quantum device that can measure 3D acceleration using ultracold atoms, something once thought nearly impossible. By chilling rubidium atoms to near absolute zero and ...

* * *

[Photonic Quantum Chips Are Making AI Smarter and Greener](/releases/2025/06/250608222002.htm)

June 8, 2025 — A team of researchers has shown that even small-scale quantum computers can enhance machine learning performance, using a novel photonic quantum circuit. Their findings suggest that today s quantum technology isn t just experimental it can already ...

* * *

June 7, 2025 — Unlike birds, which navigate unknown environments with remarkable speed and agility, drones typically rely on external guidance or pre-mapped routes. However, a groundbreaking development by ...

June 3, 2025 — The effects of artificial intelligence on adolescents are nuanced and complex, according to a new report that calls on developers to prioritize features that protect young people from exploitation, manipulation and the erosion of real-world ...

* * *

[Self-Powered Artificial Synapse Mimics Human Color Vision](/releases/2025/06/250602155323.htm)

June 2, 2025 — Despite advances in machine vision, processing visual data requires substantial computing resources and energy, limiting deployment in edge devices. Now, researchers from Japan have developed a self-powered artificial synapse that distinguishes ...

* * *

[Engineers Develop Self-Healing Muscle for Robots](/releases/2025/05/250530151849.htm)

May 30, 2025 — Students recently unveiled their invention of a robotic actuator -- the 'muscle' that converts energy into a robot's physical movement -- that has the ability to detect punctures or pressure, heal the injury and repair its damage-detecting ...

* * *

[AI Meets Game Theory: How Language Models Perform in Human-Like Social Scenarios](/releases/2025/05/250528132456.htm)

May 30, 2025 — Large language models (LLMs) -- the advanced AI behind tools like ChatGPT -- are increasingly integrated into daily life, assisting with tasks such as writing emails, answering questions, and even ...

* * *

[Horses 'Mane' Inspiration for New Generation of Social Robots](/releases/2025/05/250528214222.htm)

May 29, 2025 — Interactive robots should not just be passive companions, but active partners -- like therapy horses who respond to human emotion -- say ...

* * *
